key.name: indicator-position
key.summary: Position of the extension icon on the panel
key.description: Sets the position of the extension icon on the top panel. Can be 'left', 'center', or 'right'.

key.name: date-menu-position
key.summary: Position of the Date/Time menu on the panel
key.description: Sets the position of the Date/Time menu on the top panel. Can be 'left', 'center', or 'right'.

key.name: show-overview-at-startup
key.description: If set to true, the overview will be shown when GNOME Shell starts.
